landing.heroDescription: A powerful dashboard for property managers to monitor, analyze, and curate guest feedback across all your Flex Living properties.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything You Need to Manage Reviews
landing.featuresDescription: A comprehensive solution for monitoring guest satisfaction and showcasing your best reviews.
landing.features.analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
landing.features.analytics.description: Track property performance with detailed analytics, rating distributions, and trend indicators.
landing.features.filtering.title: Smart Filtering
landing.features.filtering.description: Filter reviews by property, channel, rating, sentiment, and date range to find exactly what you need.
landing.features.curation.title: Review Curation
landing.features.curation.description: Select which reviews appear on your public website with one-click approval and bulk actions.
landing.features.issues.title: Issue Detection
landing.features.issues.description: Automatically identify underperforming categories and properties that need attention.
landing.features.multichannel.title: Multi-Channel Support
landing.features.multichannel.description: Aggregate reviews from Airbnb, Booking.com, VRBO, and direct bookings in one place.
landing.features.publicDisplay.title: Public Display
landing.features.publicDisplay.description: Beautifully designed property pages with curated reviews to build trust with potential guests.
landing.ctaDescription: Explore the dashboard demo with realistic review data from Flex Living properties.

dashboard.title: Reviews Dashboard
dashboard.pageDescription: Manage and analyze guest feedback across all properties
dashboard.filters.title: Filters
dashboard.noReviews.title: No reviews found
dashboard.noReviews.description: Try adjusting your filters to see more results.

properties.heroDescription: Premium serviced apartments across London's most desirable neighborhoods. Experience the comfort of home with hotel-quality service.
properties.exploreCollection: Explore our collection of premium apartments
properties.cantFindProperty: Can't find the property you're looking for?
properties.cantFindPropertyDescription: Our team is here to help you find the perfect apartment for your stay in London. Contact us for personalized recommendations.
properties.footer.tagline: Premium serviced apartments in London's best locations.
properties.footer.company.title: Company
properties.footer.connect.title: Connect

propertyDetail.booknow.description: Are you sure you want to book this property?
propertyDetail.reviews.title: Guest Reviews
propertyDetail.reviews.basedOn: Based on verified guest reviews from our booking platforms.

propertyDetail.reviews.noReviews.description: Be the first to review this property!
